hooks.command: FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // .path // empty'); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.cs$'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && dotnet build --no-restore 2>&1 | head -30 || true; fi

hooks.prompt: Verify subagent completed ALL tasks. Check: 1) All assigned work done? 2) All files created? 3) Solution builds without errors? 4) No hardcoded secrets? If incomplete: {"decision": "block", "reason": "Continue: [specific instruction]"}. If complete: {"decision": "allow"}
